items.sentence: Tom and Mary live across the street from John and Alice.
Tom and Mary are fighting over who should be the driver.
Tom and his wife plan to stay in Boston for three weeks.
Did Tom say he thought that it would be easy to do that?
Did Tom say that he thought it would be easy to do that?
Did you ask Tom if he thought that he'd be able do that?
I can't believe Tom said such hateful things about Mary.
I was surprised that Tom didn't go fishing last weekend.
I can't believe that that's what's really bothering Tom.
Tom wants desperately to believe what Mary said is true.
